item.title: Version 0.9.8.4
item.description:
New Features:

  • Fix animation to be better
  • Added support for update reminders

Bug Fixes:

  • Fixed regression where verification was removed
  • Fixed regressions where schema function introduced a tab
  • Fixed issue where duplicate profiles could be sent for addresses
  • Fixed issue where context was obtained by name instead of ID

item.title: Version 0.9.5
item.description:
New Features:

  • Onboarding Flow
  • The app helps you login, set up agent profile & syncs your data
  • Added Support
  • The app now supports Phone Numbers & Email Addresses
  • Added Support for modifying groups
  • You can now add contacts to groups

Bug Fixes:

  • Much better responses to questions
  • Fixed issue 2
